query: I need help crafting a 7-day travel plan for two individuals, departing from St. Louis and intending to visit 3 separate cities in California. The travel dates are from March 17th to March 23rd, 2022. We have a budget of $9,500 to cover all expenses. As for dining preferences, we are particularly fond of American and Chinese cuisines.
goal: Trip from St. Louis to California; start date: 2022-03-17; duration: 7 day(s); budget: $9500; people: 1; city count target: 3; preferences: American, Chinese; must cities: None; priority cities: None
actions: choose_city_bundle:[San Diego,Redding,Sacramento]
